byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and CLIFFORD KRAUSS

abstract: The takeover, which including debt is valued at $38 billion, is one of the biggest energy deals in recent years and will create a new giant with more than 67,000 miles of pipeline.
snippet: The takeover, which including debt is valued at $38 billion, is one of the biggest energy deals in recent years and will create a new giant with more than 67,000 miles of pipeline.

headline.main: Kinder Morgan to Buy El Paso for $21.1 Billion
